<div style="max-width: 650px; margin: 0 auto; color:white; padding:1.5rem 0; text-align:center;">

Welcome to the homepage for the newly formed (*est.* November 2025) **Vancouver, BC Chapter of the Society for Conservation GIS**.

This group aims to bring together the community of conservation-related Geographic Information System (GIS) practitioners across Vancouver and the broader region of southern British Columbia.

Our chapter is an affiliated chapter of the 
<a href="https://www.scgis.org/" style="color:#cce8ff; text-decoration:underline;">Society for Conservation GIS (SCGIS)</a>.

SCGIS helps bring together conservation practitioners and GIS technology by supporting communication and networking, scholarships, and training across the world through a system of connected 
<a href="https://www.scgis.org/chapters" style="color:#cce8ff; text-decoration:underline;">chapters</a> in various cities and countries. Membership is open to anyone looking to engage in a GIS conservation community.

</div>

```{=html}
<div class="card" style="padding:1rem; border-radius:10px;border:1px solid #253351;">
  <h5 class="card-title" style="margin:0;">Mailing List</h5>
  <p class="card-subtitle mb-10" style="margin:.25rem 0 0.25rem 0; opacity:1;">
    Join the mailing list for event updates.
  </p>

  <form id="signup-form">
    <label for="email" style="display:block; margin-top:.6rem; font-weight:600;">Email</label>
    <input id="email" name="email" type="email" required autocomplete="email"
           style="width:100%; padding:.5rem; border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:8px;">

    <label for="firstName" style="display:block; margin-top:.6rem; font-weight:600;">First Name</label>
    <input id="firstName" name="firstName" type="text" required autocomplete="given-name"
           style="width:100%; padding:.5rem; border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:8px;">

    <label for="lastName" style="display:block; margin-top:.6rem; font-weight:600;">Last Name</label>
    <input id="lastName" name="lastName" type="text" required autocomplete="family-name"
           style="width:100%; padding:.5rem; border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:8px;">

    <label for="affiliation" style="display:block; margin-top:.6rem; font-weight:600;">Affiliation</label>
    <input id="affiliation" name="affiliation" type="text" autocomplete="organization"
           style="width:100%; padding:.5rem; border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:8px;">

    <button type="submit"
            style="margin-top:1rem; padding:.6rem 1rem; border:0; border-radius:8px; cursor:pointer;background-color: #277d8e; color: white;">
      Sign Up
    </button>
  </form>

  <div id="signup-msg" aria-live="polite" style="margin-top:.6rem; font-size:.95rem;"></div>
</div>

<script>
  // Your deployed Apps Script Web App URL (must be the /exec URL)
  const WEB_APP_URL =
    "https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbz_JkgiIFZNZlUv1OHENZJJvqQbEyRB3azFXZNKuaKwuYc_tNAPGgmDpPmsRhLLDBE/exec";

  const form = document.getElementById("signup-form");
  const msg  = document.getElementById("signup-msg");

  form.addEventListener("submit", async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    msg.textContent = "Submitting…";

    const payload = {
      email:       document.getElementById("email").value.trim(),
      firstName:   document.getElementById("firstName").value.trim(),
      lastName:    document.getElementById("lastName").value.trim(),
      affiliation: document.getElementById("affiliation").value.trim()
    };

    try {
      await fetch(WEB_APP_URL, {
        method: "POST",
        mode: "no-cors",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify(payload)
      });
      form.reset();
      msg.textContent = "Thanks! You're on the list.";
    } catch (err) {
      console.error(err);
      msg.textContent = "Sorry—something went wrong. Please try again.";
    }
  });
</script>
```
